casebody.data:
EDISON FIXTURE COMPANY, INCORPORATED, PLAINTIFF-APPELLANT, v. HARRY LEVINSTEIN, DEFENDANT-APPELLEE. Argued October 8, 1924 Decided February 5, 1925.

Before Justices Trun chard, Mixture and Lloyd.

For the appellant, Herman B. J. Wechstein. For the appellee, Thomas P. Curley. Pee Cceiam.

This case was argued with, and is controlled by, our decision in Edison Fixture Co., Inc., v. Copoulos, No. 475, of the present term.

The judgment will he reversed and a venire de novo awarded.
